name: Tower (Falme)
description:
Hey, some things :

This is a 2 Players Local Game (One SmartPhone, 2 Persons)
It's Still a Prototype, the future of it, I don't know, But I'm doing a Physical one too.

The Rules are:
Each Player select a Piece with numbers
The Numbers need to match in some way, they are
Existing One (17 and 7 match, because both have 7 |  20 and 12 match, both have 2)
Or half/double (12 and 6 match | 2 and 4 match, because they are double ou half)

The objective is to block the next player to build their tower.

Good Game, tell me what you think

:D

Also Project Github: https://github.com/Falme/Tower
